name: Coghlan's Contain-Alls
description: These plastic containers are designed to store and pour the stuff you need in the backcountry. They’re ideal for liquids and oils, as well as grainy solids like coffee, sugar, and cocoa.Made of food-grade plastic.Bottles are flexible, light, and easy to pack.Washable and reusable.Caps are interchangeable.Set includes seven containers: one 120ml, two 60ml, two 30ml and two 15ml.
